projects.name: AI Powered Transcription App
projects.description: Developing an application that enables users to transcribe movies, series, or videos. Features include options to upload personal videos or fetch content directly from YouTube. Backend development is currently in progress.

projects.name: Deep Learning Model For Fresh or Rotten Fruits Classification
projects.description: Developed and implemented a deep learning model for classifying fresh and rotten fruits, leveraging advanced data augmentation techniques and transfer learning to achieve >92% accuracy in multiclass image classification using CNNs.

projects.name: Burak-OS
projects.description: Developing a portfolio website styled like a retro operating system. Features include a nostalgic user interface with vibrant windows, draggable elements, and clickable desktop icons. The design aims to combine playful aesthetics with seamless navigation, creating an engaging user experience.
